alert.note: Alert for Galiuro and Pinaleno Mountains including Mount Graham; White Mountains of Graham and Greenlee Counties including Hannagan Meadow (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 30 at 2:12PM MST until December 02 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM THIS EVENING TO 5 AM MST SATURDAY ABOVE 6500 FEET... * WHAT...Snow expected above 6,500 feet. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches. * WHERE...White Mountains of Graham and Greenlee Counties above 6,500 ft. * WHEN...From 8 PM this evening to 5 AM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult, especially Friday afternoon and evening which is expected to be the period with the most accumulation.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Galiuro and Pinaleno Mountains including Mount Graham; White Mountains of Graham and Greenlee Counties including Hannagan Meadow
